text:
非常感謝您一直以來的耐心協助和詳細解答。 您的專業態度和豐富知識給我們留下了深刻的印象。 我們真誠地感謝您在這個過程中付出的時間和努力。
關於您提到的安全文檔連結，我仔細查看了郵件內容，但似乎未能找到該連結。 這可能是因為某些技術原因導致連結未能成功附加或顯示。 不過，這並不影響我們對您幫助的感激之情。
trans:
Thank you very much for your patience and detailed answers over time. Your professional attitude and extensive knowledge have really impressed us. We sincerely appreciate the time and effort you have devoted to this process.
Regarding the secure document link you mentioned, I carefully reviewed the email content but seemed unable to locate the link. This might be due to some technical reasons that caused the link not to be successfully attached or displayed. However, this does not diminish our gratitude for your assistance.
